metadata.summary: Catalog of 15 third-party extensions including Atomic Red Team, Cloud CLI, Hayabusa, Velociraptor, YARA, and Zeek
metadata.primary_use_case: Discovering and selecting third-party extensions for integrations and specialized security capabilities

cross_refs.description: Explains the extension framework these third-party extensions are built on
Explains how to interact with these extensions using configurations and requests
Provides context on add-on marketplace where these extensions are found
Lists extensions built by LimaCharlie rather than third parties
